Comment: Status?
improvement_comment: Provide clearer status updates to customers.

Comment: As per our call just now pls rush the 6 inch ANSI 150 flanges to Tuas site by 3pm today. Foreman waiting.
improvement_comment: Improve delivery speed to ensure 6 inch ANSI 150 flanges reach Tuas site by 3pm.

Comment: MTC received but cert date shows March 2024, our PO is Feb 2024. Which batch is this? Pls clarify asap.
improvement_comment: Provide clear batch date information matching the PO date for better clarity.

Comment: Can faster or not? Client side keep asking me already. Need the DI fittings by COB today if not project delay.
improvement_comment: Please expedite the delivery of DI fittings to meet today's COB deadline to avoid project delays.

Comment: Good support from your Katherine during LKG project shutdown last month. Hope can maintain same service level for upcoming Jurong Island works.
improvement_comment: Maintain the same service level for upcoming Jurong Island works.

Comment: Wrong item sent again. This is 3rd time already. I ordered PN16 you send PN10. Pls arrange collection and replacement urgent.
improvement_comment: Improve order accuracy to ensure the correct product (PN16) is sent instead of PN10.

Comment: Refer to my email dated 15 Oct regarding the manhole covers for Woodlands site. Still no reply from your side?
improvement_comment: Respond promptly to customer emails regarding manhole covers for the Woodlands site.

Comment: Driver cannot find our Pioneer Road location. Can give him my number 9123-4567 so I can guide him in?
improvement_comment: Provide clearer location details or add a contact number for guidance when a driver cannot find the location.

Comment: Hi the valve you quoted is for freshwater system but can use for seawater or not? Our marine application need corrosion resistant.
improvement_comment: Provide valves that are corrosion-resistant for seawater marine applications.

Comment: Flanges received yesterday, quality looks good, coating finish is clean. Tks for the fast delivery.
improvement_comment: NONE

Comment: Boss asking for update on PO CC-2847. Can advise ETA? Need before CNY shutdown period starts.
improvement_comment: Provide an estimated time of arrival for PO CC-2847 before the CNY shutdown period.

Comment: This one how? Drawing shows JIS 10K but client now says must be ANSI 150. Can still change or need to reorder?
improvement_comment: Clarify product specifications with the client earlier to avoid mismatches between JIS 10K and ANSI 150 standards.

Comment: Pls send the cert
improvement_comment: Send certificates promptly upon request.

Comment: Your Ah Beng say can deliver Monday but your office say Wednesday. Which one correct? Site ready to receive Monday only.
improvement_comment: Improve communication to ensure delivery dates are consistent and accurate.

Comment: Need hydro test cert with third party witness for the 8 inch gate valves. PUB inspector very strict this time round.
improvement_comment: Provide hydro test certification with third party witness for 8 inch gate valves.

Comment: Delivery note shows 50 pcs but we count only 47 pcs at site. Foreman say maybe 3 boxes left in truck? Pls check with your driver.
improvement_comment: Verify the delivery quantity with the driver to ensure all boxes are delivered and accounted for.

Comment: Actually cancel the 304 SS flanges from yesterday order. Boss say change to 316L instead. Can amend the PO?
improvement_comment: Allow customers to amend purchase orders to change product specifications after placing an order.

Comment: Coating on the manhole covers got some bubbling spots, about 5-6 locations. LTA inspector flag this out during inspection. Can your team come check?
improvement_comment: Check and address bubbling spots on the manhole cover coatings.

Comment: Thanks for rushing out the emergency order last Friday night. Saved our shutdown schedule. Will continue to work with CC moving forward.
improvement_comment: NONE

Comment: As mentioned in my previous 3 emails and 2 calls, the dimensional tolerance is critical for this semiconductor cleanroom application. Still waiting for your QC measurement report.
improvement_comment: Provide the QC measurement report promptly to address the critical dimensional tolerance issue.

Comment: The thing for Project Changi, can check status?
improvement_comment: Provide an option for customers to check the status of Project Changi.

Comment: Why this 12 inch flange different thickness from last time? Same drawing number what. Our welding jig cannot fit now.
improvement_comment: Ensure flange thicknesses match previous batches for compatibility with existing welding jigs.

Comment: Customs hold our shipment say HS code problem. Your side or our side need to settle? Quite urgent already.
improvement_comment: Provide clearer HS code information to prevent customs delays.

Comment: Can you machine this flange face but keep the original MTC valid? Client very particular about cert validity.
improvement_comment: Ensure machining the flange face does not invalidate the original MTC certification.

Comment: Received the 2 inch SCH 40 pipes but surface got some rust spots. Not serious but worried about client feedback. Advise.
improvement_comment: Improve packaging or coating to prevent rust spots on 2 inch SCH 40 pipes.

Comment: Your quotation for the valve actuators looks good but delivery time 8 weeks is too long. Can expedite to 4 weeks? We can accept premium freight charges.
improvement_comment: Expedite delivery time for valve actuators to 4 weeks, even with premium freight charges.

Comment: Send me the torque wrench calibration certificate for the bolts you supplied last month. [This should be sent to a different vendor]
improvement_comment: Ensure torque wrench calibration certificates are sent to the correct vendor.

Comment: Pls check again, not sure why delayed. Email says ready for collection but warehouse say still waiting stock.
improvement_comment: Improve synchronization between email notifications and warehouse stock status to avoid confusion about order readiness.

Comment: Need 40 pcs of 4 inch butterfly valves with pneumatic actuators, must be explosion proof rating for Zone 2 area, delivery by next Tuesday before lunch can or not?
improvement_comment: Provide delivery of 40 explosion-proof 4 inch butterfly valves with pneumatic actuators by next Tuesday before lunch.

Comment: Jiawen from your sales team very responsive, always reply within 1 hour. Good communication makes our job easier. Please maintain this standard.
improvement_comment: Maintain the current high standard of responsiveness and communication.
